content: project peace knitting pattern introduction after the first peace-along in december 2015 i jokingly said if we could get knitters around the globe to fo- cus on peace for 21 days we might create world peace so i created a cowl pattern using a comfy cozy stitch pattern with a 4-round repeat knit approximately 1 repeat per day and at the end of 21 days or close to it you ll have a peaceful cowl there are 3 edging options one of which includes an applied i-cord on november 10 2016 i launched project peace with the hopes that this positive message would be a brightspot in the lives of knitters everywhere 15 days later over 12 000 people are involved yarn designer brooklyn tweed loft 100% wool 2 skeins 50g 275 yds 251 m in christina campbell fossil finished with option 3
